title: Fully Renovated unit w/ Balcony!
posting_body: An upstairs unit, 1 bedroom with an office space, 1 bath has been fully renovated.
Fresh paint throughout the unit along with new flooring.
The kitchen has all new counters, cabinets, refrigerator and gas-stove.
The bath has been fully remodeled as well and includes a new tub and vanity set.
Beautiful balcony that allows lots of natural light.
Pet negotiable with references and increase on security deposit.
Fenced community with a big courtyard.
Renters insurance with $300,000 in liability & the owner added as additionally insured, is required.
Minimum of 650 credit score and minimum income level of 2.5x the rental amount are also required.
Jan Feagley, Certified Property Manager - DRE 00777442
